I told you in my previous articles that when you see many people as part of your dreams they will likely be interpreted as ;http://www.kemocity.com/channelings/dreams-interpretation-and-analysis/; elements of your personality, except if you dream of the person you love. ;
;When you see dead people in the dreams, this is varies according to the following types:

;1. The dead person with your dream has not been someone who really died, but that appears dead only as part of your dream.

;
;1. If you see somebody that is alive in the real world but appears dead in your dream, you will need to interpret this person normally, like it were an integral part of your personality. Such as, the thing is that your particular friend X is dead. How much does X mean to you personally? How can you characterize him? You would imagine X is seen as a their extreme sincerity. So, this is the characteristic that he / she represents absolutely need psychic sphere. X represents your individual sincerity.

;

;2. Now, if the person you saw within your dream is actually dead, the interpretation could be the same-this is really a component of your own personal personality you are imitating and, therefore, it's not necessary their example anymore, consequently well.
;

;

Most people have to handle several disappointments and much despair of their lives though, because they never cultivate real goodness inside their hearts.
